Title: Icarus Fell and Rusty Ate Him
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Mark Steilen
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Lip searches for his sponsor who fell off the wagon. Fiona loses a tenant but gains a furry friend. Kevin deals with his heterosexuality and Frank's upward mobility comes to an abrupt end.
